MS MCQs

    Define an AI strategy to create value in education

    »

    1. Why should educational institutions utilize AI in the classroom?

      AI can empower educators to deliver a better experience and improve outcomes for students.

      AI can save educators time, enabling shorter work-days and compressed courses.

      AI will soon replace educators, saving institutions thousands if implemented correctly.

      Human educators are always more biased than AI, so AI will make classrooms fairer.


    2. How does utilizing AI tools in the classroom better prepare students for their futures?

      AI tools help students memorize answers more efficiently, ensuring they do better on tests.

      AI tools will soon replace educators because they are faster and more efficient.

      AI will soon be a part of every job, so getting students accustomed to working with it in the classroom will prepare them for their career.

      AI tools help students take control of their own education, ask challenging questions, and leverage technology to solve complex problems.


    3. Why is broad contributor collaboration necessary for good AI integration?

      Contributors must collaborate on AI integration because it will impact stakeholders across the entire organization and requires input from many different experts.

      Contributors must collaborate on AI integration to spread the workload amongst themselves, saving time and resources.

      Contributors must collaborate on AI integration to share knowledge amongst themselves.

      Contributors must collaborate on AI integration to create a better experience for students.


    4. Why is it beneficial to personalize the learning experience for students?

      Personalized student experiences make it easier for educators to run a class.

      Personalized student experiences always improve student grades.

      Personalized student experiences save institutions money.

      Personalized experiences help students succeed by customizing their curriculum to fit their needs and learning styles.
